parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns array of paths to selected items.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[tvSelection]] control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_selection = [[tvSelection]] _ctrlTV;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvSetSelected]] [[tvIsSelected]]
</value></part></template></root>
